New Records: James Rodríguez broke Carlos Valderrama's record of 11 assists in South American World Cup qualifying
James Rodríguez equaled Falcao García's mark of 13 goals in World Cup qualifying
Key Match Events: Yerson Mosquera opened the scoring in the 25th minute
Nico Gonzalez equalized in the 48th minute
James Rodríguez scored a penalty in the 60th minute to secure the win
